definition: Sports involving competitive or recreational activities performed on wheeled equipment like bicycles, skates, or skateboards.

positive_examples: She won the gold medal in speed skating at the Olympics.
The BMX racing championship drew thousands of spectators.
He practiced skateboarding tricks at the local skate park.
The cycling tour covered 200 miles through mountain terrain.
Roller derby teams competed fiercely for the regional title.
Street skateboarding requires incredible balance and creativity.
negative_examples: The marathon runner crossed the finish line exhausted.
She dove gracefully into the swimming pool.
The tennis match went into five grueling sets.
He scored the winning goal in overtime soccer.
The gymnast performed a perfect vault routine.
They played basketball until the court lights came on.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: WaterSports, BallSports, CombatSports, Athletics
